about_the_game:
The Abandoned Levels

The Abandoned Levels is an immersive survival-horror game set in the eerie and unsettling world of the Backrooms. Your primary goal is to navigate through a series of increasingly dangerous levels, each with its own unique challenges, puzzles, and horrors, as you attempt to escape. However, escaping is no easy task—each level houses a terrifying monster that can kill you in one hit, and your survival hinges on your ability to stay calm under pressure.

Survival Is More Than Just Escaping

In addition to evading the deadly creatures lurking in each level, you must also manage your sanity. As you explore the dark and twisted environments, your sanity will slowly deplete, and if it reaches zero, you’ll succumb to the madness. Keep an eye on your Sanity Meter, and replenish it using precious Almond Water scattered throughout the levels. Maintaining your sanity is just as critical as escaping the monsters, adding a psychological layer to the horror experience.

Key Features:

  • Unique Level Designs: Each level of The Abandoned Levels offers a distinct environment filled with puzzles, secrets, and a different monster to evade. No two levels are the same, offering fresh and unpredictable gameplay as you progress through the game.

  • One-Hit Kill Monsters: Every level features a unique monster, each with its own behaviors and strategies, adding to the suspense. These creatures are relentless, and a single mistake can lead to your demise. You’ll need to outwit and outrun them if you want to survive.

  • Sanity Management: The Sanity Meter adds another layer of tension to the gameplay. Your surroundings will slowly chip away at your mental state, and if you lose your sanity, it’s game over. Almond Water is your only salvation—find it, or face the consequences.

  • Balanced Horror and Humor: While The Abandoned Levels is rooted in psychological horror, there are moments of lightheartedness that offer a brief reprieve from the tension. The balance between fear and humor creates a uniquely entertaining experience.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: The game’s atmospheric design—complete with chilling soundscapes, flickering lights, and claustrophobic environments—draws you deeper into the Backrooms. Each level feels alive with dread, making exploration both thrilling and terrifying.

  • Replayability: With multiple levels, randomized elements, and unique monster encounters, The Abandoned Levels encourages replayability. Each run will test your ability to adapt, offering new challenges each time.

Are You Brave Enough to Escape?

Prepare yourself for a journey through the unknown, where every step could be your last. In The Abandoned Levels, you’ll need quick thinking, nerves of steel, and a strong survival instinct to make it out alive. Will you conquer the levels and escape the horrors of the Backrooms, or will you fall victim to the creatures lurking in the shadows?

The challenge is waiting—dare to enter The Abandoned Levels.

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 3.2 GHz | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for faster loading times. The requirements may change in future updates.
